text.div:
FHIR Device Types

Codes used to identify medical devices. Include codes from SNOMED CT where concept is-a 49062001 (Device) and is provided as a suggestive example.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 49062001 (Device)

name: FHIR Device Types
description: Codes used to identify medical devices. Include codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 49062001 (Device)  and is provided as a suggestive example.
